item.title: Notes from Lex Fridman and Chris Lattner interview Part 2 (Lex Fridman Podcast)
item.description: After watching the 2 hour+ interview of Chris Lattner in the Lex Fridman podcast I just knew I had to write down some of the gems I heard from Chris Lattner. “Turns out if you ask a lot of dumb questions, you learn pretty quickly” “In a way, types are like assertions which are checked at compile time” “Just making a hello world, won’t get you get used to the language.
